methods.handleChunk:
Process the given update RowSequence and returns a list of JSON strings, reach representing one row of data.

:param context: (io.deephaven.kafka.publish.KeyOrValueSerializer.Context) - A KeyOrValueSerializer.Context created by KeyOrValueSerializer.makeContext(int)
:param toProcess: (io.deephaven.engine.rowset.RowSequence) - A RowSequence indicating which rows were involved
:param previous: (boolean) - True if this should be performed using the 'previous' data instead of current, as for removals.
:return: (io.deephaven.chunk.ObjectChunk<org.apache.avro.generic.GenericRecord,io.deephaven.chunk.attributes.Values>) A List of Strings containing all of the parsed update statements
methods.makeContext:
Create a context for calling KeyOrValueSerializer.handleChunk(Context, RowSequence, boolean).

:param size: (int) - The maximum number of rows that will be serialized for each chunk
:return: (io.deephaven.kafka.publish.KeyOrValueSerializer.Context) A Context for the KeyOrValueSerializer
